channel.title: Trade dupe (help)
channel.description: Hi um well im using allstar-scape trying to make it big but the trading has 2 dupes 1 is if u trade the person then he ecceps and declines both people will keep there items and get the items that was suppsoeed to be traded to them the other is if u click eccept and u x log the item will disapear

item.title: Trade dupe (help)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

public boolean unabletotrade = false;
add something in the Accept Trade or
where it says
giveItems()
add something that says
unabletotrade = true;
and if you click on your decline
if (unabletotrade == true)
break;

Read full topic
